content.title: Final Full List of Artists On the Project!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 15, 2025
content.content:
The full list of ambitious artists and crazy collaborations putting their stamp on the timeless punk rock n' roll of The Ramones has now been revealed and it's quite staggering 👀💪
Secure your limited vinyl and digisleeve CD copies of 'Ramones Redux' and 'Best of Ramones Redux,' the latest installments in our Redux Series as masterminded by Grammy-winning producer Marc Urselli, by preordering now on our Kickstarter.  
The Kickstarter campaign ends this Wednesday, March 19, so make your pledge to support this astonishing list of players and icons paying tribute to the original New York punk band!
Aborym & Kaiten (Nöctae)
Altareth feat. Vanderwolf
Arthur Brown & The Berserker BlóthaR of GWAR
Bonaparte & Flake (Rammstein)
Boots Electric (feat. Jesse Hughes & Rex Roulette from Eagles of Death Metal) with Wayne Kramer
Daníel Hjálmtýsson & Mortiis
Daniele Brusaschetto & Chvad SB (Things Outside the Skin)
David J (Bauhaus) & Paul Wallfisch (Swans, Botanica)
Deathchant
Delrei feat. Brian Chase (Yeah Yeah Yeahs) & Kid Congo Powers
Desert Roamers feat. Alain Johannes, Dave Catching & John Stanier (Battles)
Destructo Disk feat. Timo Ellis (Netherlands)
Domkraft feat. Ulf Cederlund (Entombed) and Justin Goins & Tommy Southard (Solace)
Duel
Gezan feat. Eugene Hütz (Gogol Bordello)
GlerAkur feat. Andromeda Anarchia (Folterkammer)
Imperial Triumphant & Kilter
Impostor Cult feat. Amy Tung Barrysmith (Year of the Cobra)
Kayo Dot & Ihsahn (Emperor)
King Potenaz & Nefariant
Mondo Generator
Napalm Death & Thurston Moore
Oscar Dunbar & The Heat Inc.
Raw Power feat. Sergio Milani (Kina)
Restless Spirit feat. Jeff Matz (High on Fire)
So Hideous feat. Gary Lucas (Captain Beefheart, Jeff Buckley)
Tammy Faye Starlite feat. Chris Enriquez (Spotlights)
Ufomammut feat. Bent Sæther (Motorpsycho)
Venamoris feat. Dave Lombordo (Mr. Bungle) & Paula Lombardo with Eicca Toppinen (Apocalytpica)
Vicki Peterson (The Bangles) feat. John Cowsill & Jonny Polonsky
Voidvod feat. JG Thirlwell
Volume
Zapato 3 feat. Toxic Tito & Rudy La Scala
Zeni Geva & Besvärjelsen

comments.text: Wow! That is one hell of a list of contributors, and I'm so glad to be involved, I was lucky enough to see The Ramones play live at The Cornwall Coliseum in St Austell, back in May of 1986, and they were pretty damn Awesome! I've always considered The Ramones as being the first proper Punk band in the world, they were about for some before the term Punk Rock was coined, but musically, they ere still Punk!!!

content.title: Final Artist Reveal!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 15, 2025
content.content:
We proudly present the final group of participating artists in our massive RAMONES REDUX project, capping off an incredible array of musical styles and approaches in homage to the original punk rock band!
Gezan feat. Eugene Hütz (Gogol Bordello)
Oscar Dunbar & The Heat Inc.
Daniele Brusaschetto & Chvad SB (Things Outside the Skin)
Bonaparte & Flake (Rammstein)
Desert Roamers feat. Alain Johannes, Dave Catching & John Stanier (Battles)
Raw Power feat. Sergio Milani (Kina)
Support the project by preordering your copies now on vinyl LP and CD before our Kickstarter ends!

content.title: More Ramones Redux Artist Reveals!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 10, 2025
content.content:
We continue to announce the massive array of artists paying homage to the unassailable RAMONES today with the following staggering list of participants:
Boots Electric (feat. Jesse Hughes & Rex Roulette from Eagles of Death Metal) with Wayne Kramer
Altareth feat. Vanderwolf
Vicki Peterson (The Bangles) feat. John Cowsill & Jonny Polonsky
Delrei feat. Brian Chase (Yeah Yeah Yeahs) & Kid Congo Powers
Tammy Faye Starlite feat. Chris Enriquez (Spotlights)
Imperial Triumphant & Kilter
We can't wait to present our latest Redux installment this summer, so preorder your copies of the stunning vinyl and digisleeve CD now via this Kickstarter campaign!

content.title: Big Artist Update for Ramones Redux!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Today we're incredibly stoked to unveil another batch of artists and collaborations appearing on RAMONES REDUX and BEST OF RAMONES REDUX, some true legends taking part in honoring the world's first true punk rock band:
Voidvod feat. JG Thirlwell
Deathchant
Kayo Dot & Ihsahn (Emperor)
Restless Spirit feat. Jeff Matz (High on Fire)
Volume
Get in on this massive undertaking and support the Kickstarter by preordering your copies now on gatefold limited vinyl and digisleeve CD!

content.title: Another Batch of Artists Paying Tribute to the RAMONES!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 6, 2025
content.content:
Today we present another group of phenomenal and surprising artists taking part in our Redux homage to the world's first punk band!  We can't wait to begin sharing music with you, but in the meantime, please welcome to the project:
Venamoris feat. Dave Lombordo & Paula Lombardo with Eicca Toppinen of Apocalytpica
Duel
Zeni Geva & Besvärjelsen
Zapato 3 feat. Toxic Tito & Rudy La Scala
There are more massive artists still to be revealed, so be sure to back the Kickstarter now by preordering your copies of the deluxe Redux gatefold vinyl and digisleeve CD editions!

content.title: Unveiling more RAMONES REDUX artists!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 4, 2025
content.content:
Continuing with our Redux Series campaign in reverence to the original punk rock band THE RAMONES, we're stoked to unveil another batch of unique artist pairings taking part in the project with tracks on the upcoming RAMONES REDUX and BEST OF RAMONES REDUX releases:

Ufomammut feat. Bent Sæther (Motorpsycho)

Arthur Brown & The Berserker BlóthaR of GWAR

So Hideous feat. Gary Lucas (Captain Beefheart, Jeff Buckley)

GlerAkur feat. Andromeda Anarchia (Folterkammer)

content.title: More Massive Artist Reveals!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
March 1, 2025
content.content:
Today we're stoked to reveal more of the incredible artist collaborations assembled in reverence of The Ramones, with each of these pairings or groups having been brought together to create a magical moment and an unforgettable punk rock homage:
Napalm Death & Thurston Moore
Daníel Hjálmtýsson & Mortiis
Domkraft feat. Ulf Cederlund (Entombed) and Justin Goins & Tommy Southard (Solace)
David J (Bauhaus) & Paul Wallfisch (Swans, Botanica)

content.title: First Artist Reveals!
content.creator:
Magnetic Eye Records
February 27, 2025
content.content:
Today we're stoked as hell to reveal the first batch of artists taking part in our upcoming RAMONES REDUX and BEST OF RAMONES REDUX releases!  Can't tell you how excited we are to unveil some of the amazing collaborations producer Marc Urselli organized for some truly unforgettable Ramones renditions:

Impostor Cult feat. Amy Tung Barrysmith (Year of the Cobra)
King Potenaz & Nefariant
Mondo Generator
Destructo Disk feat. Timo Ellis (Netherlands)
There are TONS more artist reveals to come, but if just knowing that we're dedicating the next installment of our Redux Series to the world's first true punk rock band is enough, then support the campaign and grab your copies of the limited vinyl and CD editions now!
